name: MovieChain
0:
”Alexa, Launch Movie Chain”
”Repeat the clue”
”Tell me the answer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie chain
des: A Movie Chain is a series of three popular movie titles that are connected by common words. The first movie title will end with first word or words of the second movie title. The second movie title will end with the first word or words of the third movie title. Ask Movie Chain for new clue for a randomly selected movie chain. The clue will tell you the first and last words of the chain and how many blanks are in between. Try to fill the blanks to solve the movie chain. Then ask Movie Chain for the answer to see if you are right!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
